# Build results
bin/
obj/
[Bb]uild/
[Ll]og/
*.log

# User-specific files
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio cache and indexing
.vs/
*.vsidx

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
*.nuspec

# Backup & temporary files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.temp
*.~*

# Debug and release folders
Debug/
Release/

# Publish folder
publish/

# Resharper and Rider
*.DotSettings.user
.idea/

# Windows image cache
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Others
*.dbmdl
*.pidb
*.svclog
*.pdb
*.cache
*.config

# Auto-generated files
Generated_Code/

# Optional: ignore test results
TestResults/
*.trx
*.coverage
*.coveragexml
